testsuite.name: oradb::installdb CentOS remote oradb utils structure

testcase.name: oradb::installdb CentOS remote oradb utils structure should contain Oradb::Utils::Dbstructure[oracle structure 12.1.0.1] with oracle_base_home_dir => "/oracle", ora_inventory_dir => "/oracle/oraInventory", os_user => "oracle", os_group => "dba", os_group_install => "oinstall", os_group_oper => "oper", user_base_dir => "/home" and create_user => "true"
